   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Read the Docs Intergration Hub's documentation!
==========================================================

ThorHammer V2 (THv2) is a platform developed by OK Blockchain Centre to ease and fasten the Decentralized App development process. The platform provides an easy and secured integration using JSON API from the client to the blockchain. As of now, clients can access various blockchain from the Integration Hub without having any difficulties to deploy the nodes at their side. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: User Documentation

   getting-started

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Reference
   
   bitcoin
   ethereum
   thor
